other_tests.findings: Elevated IgG (2,117 mg/dl; normal range: 380–1,400 mg/dl), normal IgM (69 mg/dl; normal range: 37–225 mg/dl), normal IgE (53 IU/ml; normal range up to 155 IU/ml), and low IgA (19 mg/dl; normal range: 30–250 mg/dl). Dihydrorhodamine reduction (DHR) test showed normal oxidative burst.
Confirmed TB infection using PCRs with IS6110 and mtp40 primers on blood and sputum.
Two pathogenic homozygous variants in IL12RB1 gene at Exon 9, c.913A>T (p. Lys305*).
